
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19054438" title="发布于 2025-08-23 14:31">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款基于 Ant Design 设计语言实现、漂亮的 .NET Avalonia UI 控件库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一款基于 Ant Design 设计语言实现、漂亮的 .NET Avalonia UI 控件库：AtomUI。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AtomUI项目介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AtomUI 是一款基于 Ant Design 设计语言实现、漂亮的 .NET Avalonia UI 控件库，致力于将 Ant Design 优秀而高效的设计语言和体验带入 Avalonia/.NET 跨平台桌面软件开发领域。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250823142755484-176186159.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Avalonia介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Avalonia是一个强大的框架，使开发人员能够使用.NET创建跨平台应用程序。它使用自己的渲染引擎绘制UI控件，确保在Windows、macOS、Linux、Android、iOS和WebAssembly等不同平台上具有一致的外观和行为。这意味着开发人员可以共享他们的UI代码，并在不同的目标平台上保持统一的外观和感觉。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247504673&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=8cb0b8624e3a452bdc75d6551613cecf&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/_JE8G68qdSuxv-dKRRymyQ</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>运行环境</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>.NET 8 及其以上</span></li>
<li><span>Avalonia 11.1.1 及其以上</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源代码</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250823142810934-907780959.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr><th><span>包名称</span></th><th><span>描述</span></th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><span>AtomUI</span></td>
<td><span>主库，包含了主题系统和 AtomUI OSS 版本所有的控件</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>AtomUI.Controls.DataGrid</span></td>
<td><span>数据表格控件定义，如果不用可以不引入</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>AtomUI.Generator</span></td>
<td><span>自定义控件需要的一些源码生成器定义，您如果在自定义控件的时候需要接入 AtomUI 主题系统，需要引入此包</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><span>AtomUI.IconPkg.Generator</span></td>
<td><span>如果您需要自定义 Icon 包，需要引入此包</span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>快速使用 AtomUI 库</span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>类库安装</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>dotnet add package AtomUI --version 1.0.0-alpha<br></span></code></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>配置项目文件</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&lt;Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk"&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PropertyGroup&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;OutputType&gt;WinExe&lt;/OutputType&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;TargetFramework&gt;net9.0&lt;/TargetFramework&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Nullable&gt;enable&lt;/Nullable&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;BuiltInComInteropSupport&gt;true&lt;/BuiltInComInteropSupport&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ApplicationManifest&gt;app.manifest&lt;/ApplicationManifest&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;AvaloniaUseCompiledBindingsByDefault&gt;true&lt;/AvaloniaUseCompiledBindingsByDefault&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/PropertyGroup&gt;<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ItemGroup&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="AtomUI" Version="0.0.6-build.4"/&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="Avalonia.Desktop" Version="11.3.2"/&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="Avalonia.Diagnostics" Version="11.3.2"&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;IncludeAssets Condition="'$(Configuration)' != 'Debug'"&gt;None&lt;/IncludeAssets&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PrivateAssets Condition="'$(Configuration)' != 'Debug'"&gt;All&lt;/PrivateAssets&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/PackageReference&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ItemGroup&gt;<br><span>&lt;/Project&gt;<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>配置程序入口文件</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code>using<span>&nbsp;Avalonia;<br>using<span>&nbsp;System;<br>namespace<span>&nbsp;AtomUIProgressApp<span>;<br>class<span>&nbsp;Program<br><span>{<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; [STAThread<span>]<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>public<span>&nbsp;<span>static<span>&nbsp;<span>void<span>&nbsp;<span>Main<span>(<span>string<span>[] args<span>)<span>&nbsp;=&gt; BuildAvaloniaApp()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .StartWithClassicDesktopLifetime(args);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>public<span>&nbsp;<span>static<span>&nbsp;AppBuilder&nbsp;<span>BuildAvaloniaApp<span>(<span>)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;var<span>&nbsp;builder = AppBuilder.Configure&lt;App&gt;()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .UsePlatformDetect()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .WithInterFont()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .With(new<span>&nbsp;Win32PlatformOptions())<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .LogToTrace();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;var<span>&nbsp;themeBuilder = builder.CreateThemeManagerBuilder();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseCultureInfo(new<span>&nbsp;CultureInfo(LanguageCode.en_US));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseTheme(ThemeManager.DEFAULT_THEME_ID);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseOSSControls();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;return<span>&nbsp;builder.UseAtomUI(themeBuilder);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>}<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>控件库效果体验</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>AtomUI Gallery下载地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/chinware/atomui/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/chinware/atomui/releases</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250823142843892-998396151.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/chinware/atomui" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/chinware/atomui</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞</strong><span>）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
